attributes.action: accept that if Westminster is due for unprecedented change away from British and Parliamentary Tradition then can we the signers of this petition comprimise and withdraw from the European Union.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Westminster and Parliament changing from being the mother of all parliaments to becoming just another sheep parliament, the same as other parliamentary models all over the world to restore its full legitmitate authority over the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland and restore power to parliament and not Brussells and Strasbourg as a comprimise

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
